description:
As of 1478 nova now defaults to noauth for the EC2 and OSAPI's.

We should default to noauth for the EC2 admin API as well.

---

Until we get this I'm unable to run the nova test_admin smoke_tests cleanly w/ trunk:

UserTests
    test_001_admin_can_connect                                  ERROR
    test_002_admin_can_create_user                              ERROR
    test_003_admin_can_create_project                           ERROR
    test_004_user_can_download_credentials                      ERROR
    test_999_tearDown                                           ERROR
title: default to noauth for the EC2 admin API

comments.content:
As of 1478 nova now defaults to noauth for the EC2 and OSAPI's.

We should default to noauth for the EC2 admin API as well.

---

Until we get this I'm unable to run the nova test_admin smoke_tests cleanly w/ trunk:

UserTests
    test_001_admin_can_connect                                  ERROR
    test_002_admin_can_create_user                              ERROR
    test_003_admin_can_create_project                           ERROR
    test_004_user_can_download_credentials                      ERROR
    test_999_tearDown                                           ERROR
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
